body_html:
I found the answer by using tf.pad() in this post, so I will close this topic.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/37659538/custom-padding-for-convolutions-in-tensorflow

However, it should be mentioned in the doc this issue because the actual tensorflow's guide is not clear enough at this point ! Thanks
